attributes.action: Abolish Welfare. Make everyone over 16 who is unemployed, work or emigrate
attributes.background: It is costing to much. It costs in excess of £119 billion a year. Where are we finding this money from? Why should the tax payer pay for everyone. There is 6.5 million on disability. 2 Million unemployed. If they can't afford to live here, have automatic emigration from the UK.

rejection.details: This petition has been rejected because the Government does not have the power to deport its own citizens. However we would be able to accept a petition that called for the abolishing of all benefits, and if you resubmitted a petition solely on that issue we may be able to accept it.
